name: Ancient White Dragon
movement: 40 ft. walking, 40 ft. burrowing, 80 ft. flying, 40 ft. swimming
description: The Ancient White Dragon is a gargantuan creature with scales as cold and hard as ice. It is a savage predator that rules the frozen tundras, often seen as a terrifying presence in the battlefield. Its powerful build combines brute strength with the capacity for significant cold-based attacks, including an icy breath weapon.
memorable: This dragon is a relentless predator that can manipulate the battlefield with chilling breath and powerful physical attacks, often toying with its prey before delivering a fatal blow.
goals: To establish dominance over its territory and hunt anything that enters its icy domain.
relations: Other dragons, particularly chromatic types, and various icy creatures native to harsh winter climates.
environment: Frozen tundras, glaciers, and massive ice caverns.
strengths: Immunity to cold damage and prowess in cold-based abilities, making it a significant threat in icy terrains.
weaknesses: Lower Dexterity could make it vulnerable to ranged attacks if not adequately protected.
attacks: The dragon can unleash powerful bite, claw, and tail attacks; it can also spit ice and exhale a devastating cold breath that freezes its foes.
most_powerful_ability: Cold Breath, unleashing a 90-foot cone of frigid air that deals substantial cold damage and can severely hinder movement.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 60 feet and a high passive perception of 23, allowing it to effectively detect and engage foes.
skills: Skilled in intimidation and keen perception, adding to its fearsome reputation.
additional_information: Cold Mastery allows unhindered movement and vision in icy conditions.
Legendary Resistance enables it to automatically succeed on failed saving throws three times a day.
Numbing Chill reduces enemy movement speed for those close to it, complicating their positioning.
spellcasting: Innate spellcasting with spells like dominate beast, sleet storm, and wall of ice.
